# MTLLanguageVersion.version2_1

**Case**

Version 2.1 of the Metal shading language.

## Declaration

```swift
case version2_1
```

## Version numbers

- **MTLLanguageVersion.version1_1**: Version 1.1 of the Metal shading language.
- **MTLLanguageVersion.version1_2**: Version 1.2 of the Metal shading language.
- **MTLLanguageVersion.version2_0**: Version 2.0 of the Metal shading language.
- **MTLLanguageVersion.version2_2**: Version 2.2 of the Metal shading language.
- **MTLLanguageVersion.version2_3**: Version 2.3 of the Metal shading language.
- **MTLLanguageVersion.version2_4**: Version 2.4 of the Metal shading language.
- **MTLLanguageVersion.version3_0**: Version 3.0 of the Metal shading language.
- **MTLLanguageVersion.version3_1**: Version 3.1 of the Metal shading language.
- **MTLLanguageVersion.version3_2**: Version 3.2 of the Metal shading language.
- **MTLLanguageVersion.version1_0**: Version 1.0 of the Metal shading language.
